patch.summary:
Recall a transfer. This could be a points transfer,
e-wallet transfer, or a gift card

TransferRecallResultModel.description: Contains the result of a recalled transfer.

id.description: The unique ID of this transfer.

type_id.description: The type ID of this transfer.

type.description: A string representation of this transfer type.

points.description: The amount of points sent in this transfer.

amount.description: The amount in $ sent in this transfer.

created_at.description: The orignal send date of this transfer.

offer.description:
The gift card in this transfer if applicable. Gift cards
are an offer sub-type in Kangaroo.

id.description: The unique ID of this gift_card_queue

enabled.description: Whether this item is enabled. Usually true.

sender_name.description: The name of the sender of this transfer.

recipient_name.description: The name of the recipient of this transfer.

email_phone.description:
The phone number or email address that this transfer
was sent to.

points.description: The amount of points sent in this transfer.

amount.description: The amount in $ sent in this transfer.

created_at.description: The orignal creation date of this transfer.

scheduled_at.description: The original scheduled delivery date of this transfer.

TransferMessage.description:
Transfer Message. These are sent to the user by
other users. They can be points or e-wallet transfers or
gift cards (which is deposited into the users' e-wallet)

id.description: A unique ID identifying this reward

points.description:
The amount of points required for this offer to be
applied. Only used for Convertible Coupons

publish_at.description: The publication date of this offer.

expires_at.description: The expiration date of this offer.

is_published.description: Whether this offer is currently published or not.

coupon_convertible.description:
Whether this is a convertible coupon. Convertible coupons are
automatically added to the customers account when the point threshold
is met. The points are automatically deducted from the users' account.

real_value.description: The real value  (in $) of this offer

discount_value.description: The discount value (in $) of this offer

multip_factor.description:
The multiplication factor of this offer. This only applies to
Point Multiplier offers.

min_purchase.description: The minimum purchase amount for this offer to be applied

max_purchase.description: The maximum purchase amount for this offer to be applied.

apps_only.description:
Whether this offer must be claimed on a mobile app
before being used in store.

type.description:
The offer type. This can be a free product, dollar based discount,
percentage based discount, point multiplier, bonus points, and free shipping.

slug.description: The unique slug for this offer

images.description:
The images attached to this offer. There are 3 available
sizes: thumbnail, medium, and large.

never_expires_flag.description:
Whether this offer ever expires or not.
If false, this offer is available indefinitely (provided any other
requirements are met)

terms_conditions.description: The terms and conditions attached to this offer.

link.description: The external link attached to this offer.

offer_languages.description: A list of translations of this offer into different languages.

actions.description: A list of possible actions to perform on this offer.

language_id.description: The ID of this specific translation

offer_terms_conditions.description: The translated offer terms and conditions.

offer_link.description: The language appropriate link of this offer.

language.description: The language for which this translation applies.

OfferTranslation.description: A language translation of this offer.

id.description: The Kangaroo ID of this language.

abbreviation.description:
A two letter abbreviation of this language.
Follows ISO standards (en, fr, es)

name.description: The full name of this language (English, French, Spanish)
